faq_section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_section.subtitle: Find here the answers to your most common questions about MyWai and creating your biographical book.

questions.question: Why give a personalized biographical book?
questions.answer: Because some memories deserve to be transmitted, shared, celebrated. MyWai helps you create a custom biography, from the words of those who know the person to celebrate best. Family, friends, colleagues: everyone can add an anecdote, a photo, a message. Everything is carefully written, laid out like a real book, then printed and delivered to you.

questions.question: Can I order other copies of the book?
questions.answer: Yes, of course. Once the book is finalized, you can order as many additional copies as you want. Degressive rate from 2 books.

questions.question: Who owns the final content of the book?
questions.answer: The text generated by MyWai belongs to you. You can print it, share it or modify it at any time. Nothing is published without your final validation.

questions.question: What happens to the data and contributions collected?
questions.answer: All shared content (texts, photos, messages) is confidential, secure, and deletable at any time. They are never used for other purposes.

questions.question: Can we modify the book once generated?
questions.answer: Yes. You can reread, correct, enrich or reorganize the chapters before printing. It's your book, our AI is just there to help you write it.

questions.question: What if I want to create a book for someone else?
questions.answer: It's entirely possible! You can give a book, create a multi-person project (with or without crowdfunding), and invite loved ones to contribute easily.

cgu.title: 📋 Terms and Conditions of Use – MyWai

introduction.title: 1. Purpose
introduction.content:
The purpose of these Terms and Conditions of Use is to define the terms of use of the MyWai service, accessible via the site https://my-w.ai, and to specify the rights and obligations of users and the publisher.

MyWai is an online service that allows you to create a personalized biography from contributions from loved ones, generated with the help of artificial intelligence, and which can be printed as a book.

service_description.title: 2. Acceptance of conditions
service_description.content: Use of the service implies full and complete acceptance of these Terms and Conditions. By accessing the platform, creating a project or contributing to a book, you acknowledge having read, understood and accepted these conditions.

user_obligations.title: 3. Access to the service
user_obligations.content:
Access to the platform is open to any user with Internet access. Certain features are subject to creating an account or paying for a project (direct purchase or crowdfunding).

MyWai reserves the right to temporarily or permanently suspend access to its services, without notice, particularly for maintenance or updates.

content_creation.title: 4. Content creation
content_creation.content:
Users can:

• Create a project space for a person to celebrate

• Invite loved ones to contribute via messages, anecdotes, photos, audio files

• Modify, review and validate content before printing

Content generated by AI is based exclusively on the elements provided. The end user remains responsible for verifying and validating texts before printing.

intellectual_property.title: 5. Intellectual property
intellectual_property.content:
All texts generated as part of a MyWai project are the property of the end user once payment has been made.

MyWai claims no rights of distribution or commercial exploitation of the finalized content, except by explicit agreement.

The user guarantees having the necessary rights to the content (texts, images, testimonials) that they upload or invite to share.

data_privacy.title: 6. Personal data protection
data_privacy.content:
MyWai undertakes to respect the confidentiality of collected data:

• Contributions are private, not indexed, and accessible only to invited persons

• No data is transferred to third parties

• The user can request deletion of their data at any time via Alia@my-w.ai

Data is stored securely on servers hosted in Europe, in accordance with GDPR.

payment_delivery.title: 7. Pricing
payment_delivery.content:
Service rates (printed book, additional options, digital versions, etc.) are indicated on the site. MyWai reserves the right to modify its prices at any time.

Projects funded by crowdfunding are unlocked only if the total amount is reached. In case of failure, contributors can be refunded or invited to complete the amount.

cancellation.title: 8. Right of withdrawal
cancellation.content: For any purchase of printed book, the user has a legal withdrawal period as long as the content has not been validated for printing. Once validation is confirmed, the book enters production and cannot be canceled or refunded, except for manifest defect.

liability.title: 9. Responsibility
liability.content:
MyWai cannot be held responsible:

• For comments shared by contributors

• For errors or omissions in content validated by the user

• For delays related to printing or delivery providers

The user undertakes to use the service respectfully, without hate speech, defamatory or discriminatory comments.

modifications.title: 10. Modification of Terms
modifications.content: These conditions may be modified at any time. Users will be informed of important modifications. Continued use of the service after modification constitutes acceptance.
